beat-motion.name: Beat Motion
beat-motion.description: An interface between the body and sound. A Kinect-based motion tracking app for the body's motino to send MIDI signals.
beat-motion.full_description: Beat Motion is a MIDI controller for music production built using a Kinect. It allows the user to control knobs using his/her left arm and to send notes with a 2x3 grid on the right hand.

waterfall.description: An immersive biofeedback project where concentration, measure by beta EEG waves, controls the flow of time in a VR platformer game.
